meaningMnemonic: If something is <kanji>special</kanji> you <kanji>choose</kanji> it. That makes it a <vocabulary>special selection</vocabulary> of yours and it gets a <vocabulary>special prize</vocabulary> that only you could give!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
